description: A short description of this task

ops_manager_url.description: URL, including port, of the Ops Manager applciation server

project_id.description: The ID of the Project to build the instance within

curl_ca_cert_path.description: The absolute path on the node performing the API call for the CA cert, if required

json_payload.description: The JSON payload for the build

curl_username.description: The username for the API call

curl_token.description: The token for the API user
